# Prediction project

.box-5LA[It's a competition!]

- **.darkorange[Teams of three or four]** (you should enter your team on Canvas if you haven't done so).

- You will have a **.darkorange[classification]** and a **.darkorange[prediction]** task.
  
  - Choose your best models (and compare them to <u>one</u> other method)
  
- Grade will be based on: **.darkorange[data + models (including analysis) + accuracy ranking]**

- Get an <u>early start</u> (you can start downloading and getting the data ready now)
  
  - **.darkorange[No extension for the final project]**
  - There are many **.darkorange[deadlines]** at the end of the semester.

---
# Last week

.pull-left[
- Introduction to **.darkorange[prediction]**:

  - Bias vs. Variance, validation set approach, cross-validation.
  
- One method for model selection: **.darkorange[stepwise subsetting]**:

  - We start with a null (full) model and add (substract) one variable at a time. We choose the best one through CV.
]
